How to setup Jekyll on Github

2016-12-17 10:10:46 -0500
1

Remote: Setup a github repo Local: . git init . git clone . some repos ###https://jekyllthemes.io/ ###https://github.com/YOUR-USER/lagom ###https://github.com/lukas-h/onepage.git ###https://git@github.com:johnotander/pixyll.git ###https://github.com/YOUR-USER/travelog-theme . git remote set-url origin git@github.com:undertree93/lc-leetcode.git . git checkout -b gh-pages . git push –set-upstream origin gh-pages . change _config.yml . change projects.xml . git commit -am “first time commit” . git push
